posts.post_content:
hello, my name is john and i have the following t206 cards for sale.  this is my first post in the b/s/t section.  if i am breaking any rules please let me know and i will correct them asap.  first email to [url]jonincleve@sbcglobal.net[/url] stating i will take the following will be honored.  i will accept paypal, money order, check.  i have an 8000+ feedback rating on ebay, and would like to build a good reputation here on net54. all prices dlvd usa. thank you, john

t206 ossee schreck  psa 3.5 vg+ pd 350  $45.00
t206 art fromme psa 3 vg sc 350  $45.00
t206 jake beckley sgc 40 vg pd 350  $135.00
t206 jerry freeman sgc 40 vg pd 350  $40.00
t206 oscar stanage psa 3 vg pd 350 $40.00
t206 clark griffith sgc 30 gd sc 350-460 overprint  $110
